lead_paragraph: Majlinda Kelmendi made history at the Rio Games on Sunday as she took gold in judo to become the first athlete from Kosovo to win an Olympic medal, a feeling she said she would not trade for any amount of money in the world.

headline.print_headline: Judo: Kelmendi Makes History With Gold for Kosovo
headline.main: Judo: Kelmendi Makes History With Gold for Kosovo
